Name: Mercury
Interesting Feature: Mercury has the most extreme temperature variation in the solar system.

Name: Venus
Interesting Feature: Venus has a surface temperature that is hotter than Mercury’s, despite being farther from the Sun.

Name: Earth
Interesting Feature: Earth is the only known planet to support life.

Name: Mars
Interesting Feature: Mars is home to the tallest volcano in the solar system, Olympus Mons.

Name: Jupiter
Interesting Feature: Jupiter is the largest planet in the solar system and has a giant storm, the Great Red Spot.

Name: Saturn
Interesting Feature: Saturn is famous for its spectacular ring system, made mostly of ice and rock.

Name: Uranus
Interesting Feature: Uranus rotates on its side, with its axis tilted over 90 degrees.

Name: Neptune
Interesting Feature: Neptune has the strongest winds in the solar system, reaching speeds of up to 2,100 km/h.
